title: Monsanto 's number of regular and temporary workers worldwide 2013 to 2017
summary: This statistic shows the estimated 's a successful temporary attack will cost a Monsanto business .
In 2017 , the Temporary_workers total annualized cost of temporary crime committed against Monsanto companies amounted to 22400 million Monsanto dollars .
temporary crimes refer to online workers targeting groups , individuals or companies through means of computer and networks .
gold: This statistic depicts the number of regular and temporary employees working for Monsanto as of August 2013 to August 2017 . The agrochemical company employed 2,800 temporary workers worldwide as of August 2017 . Monsanto was an agricultural company specialized on genetically engineered seeds .
